summary: Ten people are invited to a hotel in the Iranian desert, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?
cast: Charles Aznavour|Maria Rohm|Adolfo Celi|Stéphane Audran|Alberto de Mendoza|Richard Attenborough|Gert Fröbe|Herbert Lom|Elke Sommer|Oliver Reed|Orson Welles|Teresa Gimpera|Rik Battaglia|Naser Malek Motiee|Sepedeh
title: Diez negritos
